contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 4, 1979 D Chatsworth House Contest
Chatsworth House Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
chatsworth-house-contest
None
Chatsworth House Grounds, Derbyshire, England, UK Each band required to play march ' THE CHALLENGE' during its 25 minute entertainment programme. Prizes - 1st £500, 2nd £250, 3rd £100, plus a special prize of £100 for best Derbyshire band over the two day contest. 8 bands competed.
May 27, 2014, 6:54 a.m. March 30, 2017, 7:47 a.m.

2 Askern Colliery Band Ken Johnson
3 Goldthorpe Band Peter Sumner
